main event: On April 5, 1967, multiple witnesses reported sighting a bright, round, reddish-orange object hovering over Tucson, Arizona.
interesting points: The object appeared large and made no sound,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes,The object exhibited rapid accelerations and abrupt changes in direction,It was observed by over 15 adults including family members,The object turned out to be inconsistent with known aircraft behaviors.
witnesses: Multiple family members and other local residents
